data.description: TT2 plugin for transliterating cyrillic text
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This Template Toolkit plugin would be useful for generating
    understandable webpage anchor names and webpage names from cyrillic
    text. Another useful application of transliteration - converting
    cyrillic webpages into latin1 ones for users which have not cyrillic
    support on their PC. Back conversion from "translit" to cyrillic is
    useful for users without russian keyboard. They can type text in
    "translit" and post it through special filter which converts
    translit to cyrillic.
